dmca.title: John Wiley & Sons throw the book at claimed copying
dmca.body:
To Whom it May Concern: 

1. the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc., a global publisher of books, journals, and other products, or one of its related companies (
